styleCard.description: An evocative instrumental journey through the heart of Batman, Turkey. This piece combines traditional Turkish instruments like the saz and ney with a steady, driving rhythm, reflecting the methodical progression of following precise routing directions. It evokes a focused and explorative mood, mirroring the landscape traversed.

directions: Start at Akça, Köyün Kendisi Küme Evleri 131-133, 72100, Batman
At the roundabout, take the second exit onto Diyarbakır Caddesi
Finish at Bağdu, Beşiri, Batman, on the right

composition.style: AI generated music based on geographic and cultural context
